title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations         A permit is required for night photography in the park, as well as other special uses Larry Stuart  Permits  are required for special events and non-traditional uses of the park. Want to stage a photo-shoot, exercise your first amendment rights, or hold a special event at the park? Because these are not typical uses of our park and can have a significant impact on park visitors and resources, staff will review permit applications to determine whether your proposal would have a detrimental effect on the park or impact our regular visitors and will either approve or deny your permit request. To file a permit application, download and submit our Special Use Permit form.       Photography Permits are required in sensitive areas of the park for professional and commercial photography and filming.  Check here for our Photography and Film Guidelines. To apply for a photography/film permit, use either our Photography/Film Form (Long) or Photography/Film Form (Short) .
